items.description: Loughborough urban watercourses and local tributaries to the River Soar
items.message:
This Flood Alert has been removed.  

The flood forecast has changed significantly.  As a result, there is no longer a risk of flooding in the area.  Further light rainfall is forecast over the next 12 hours.  

We continue to monitor the situation.  
Please see the GOV.UK website for a 5 day flood forecast.
